p: In addition, at 180 min ( Figure 6(b)), only the EEL reduced the formation of MDA by approximately 40% at concentrations of 10 to 100 μg/mL and, at 240 min, reduced in 47% the formation of MDA, at a concentration of 100 μg/mL, which was significantly different from that of the AAPH group ( Figure 6(c)).
